title: Pseudo Gothic Headline Font
content:
Was trying to recreate this book cover. Any idea what this font is?

Title: In A Wolf's Eyes  
Author: A. Katie Rose

![13645223](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026194334im_/http:/d202m5krfqbpi5.cloudfront.net/books/1336757933l/13645223.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [13645223.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026194334/http:/typophile.com/files/13645223.jpg) | 112.03 KB |
author: alamodragon

comments.content: The title is done using [Paul Lloyd's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026194334/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/index.htm) Shrewsbury.
Oh, and be sure to grab Lloyd's Queen Empress while you're there. It is one of only two digitizations I'm aware of of Morris Fuller Benton's wonderful creation (1915) Motto.
